Body:
con = self.connect()
current_db = self.databases[0]['db']
other_db = self.databases[1]['db']
cur = con.cursor()
cur.execute('SELECT database()')
self.assertEqual(cur.fetchone()[0], current_db)
con.select_db(other_db)
cur.execute('SELECT database()')
self.assertEqual(cur.fetchone()[0], other_db)
